extensionDescription.message: Fordítsa le az oldalt valós időben Google vagy Yandex fordítóval.

btnNeverTranslate.message: Soha ne fordítsa le ezt az oldalt

btnMobileNeverTranslate.message: Soha ne fordítsa le ezt az oldalt

optionsNeverTranslate.message: Soha ne fordítsa le ezeket az oldalakat

optionsAlwaysTranslate.message: Mindig fordítsa le ezeket a nyelveket

lblShowContextMenu.message: Mutassa a fordítási lehetőséget a jobb klikkes menüben

lblUseNewAlgorithm.message: Használni kívánja az új fordítási algoritmust?

optionPopupjustWhenIClickTranlateThisSit.message: Csak akkor ha a "Oldal lefordítása"-ra kattintok

msgEmptyListNeverTranslateSites.message: Nem adott hozzá még weboldalt a listához.

msgEmptyListAlwaysTranslateLanguages.message: Nem adott hozzá még nyelvet a listához.

btnAlwaysTranslate.message: Mindig fordítsa le ezt az oldalt

lblAlwaysTranslateSites.message: Mindig fordítsa le ezeket az oldalakat

lblShowTranslateSelectedContextMenu.message: Mutassa a fordítási lehetőséget a jobb klikkes menüben

lblNeverTranslateLangs.message: Soha ne fordítsa le ezeket a nyelveket

btnNeverTranslateThisLanguage.message: Soha ne fordítsa le ezt a nyelvet

lblShowOriginalTextWhenHovering.message: Eredeti szöveg mutatása ha fölötte van a kurzor

lblShowTranslatedWhenHovering.message: Fordított szöveg mutatása ha fölötte van a kurzor

msgThanksForUseExtension.message: Thank you for using this extension.

msgIWillBeGrateful.message: I will be grateful if you can make a donation.

lblShowTranslatedHoveringSites.message: Show translated text when hovering on these sites

popupBlueWhenSiteIsTranslated.message: Make the pop-up icon blue when the site is translated

dontShowIfPageLangIsTargetLang.message: Do not show if the page language is the target language

dontShowIfPageLangIsUnknown.message: Do not show if the page language is unknown

dontShowIfSelectedTextIsTargetLang.message: Do not show if the selected text language is the target language

dontShowIfSelectedTextIsUnknown.message: Do not show if the selected text language is unknown

lblShowTranslatedWhenHoveringThisSite.message: Show translation when hovering over this site

lblShowTranslatedWhenHoveringThisLang.message: Show translation when hovering over websites in $LANGUAGE_NAME$

lblShowTranslatedHoveringLangs.message: Show translated text when hovering over sites with these languages

swapPopup.message: Switch between the old interface and the new one

helpSwapInterface.message: Click this button to switch between the old and the new interface.

lblButtonInTheAddressBar.message: Show button in the address bar

doYouWantToDeleteTranslationCache.message: Do you want to delete the translation cache?

doYouWantOverwriteAllSettings.message: Do you want to overwrite all existing settings using the backup data?

fileIsCorrupted.message: The file appears to be corrupted

doYouWantRestoreSettings.message: Do you want to restore the extension to its default settings?

lblEnableDeepL.message: Enable DeepL as a text translation service

lblSwitchTranslatedAndOriginal.message: Switch between the translated and the original page

lblTranslatePageToTargetLanguage.message: Translate the page to the target language

lbldontsortresults.message: Do not sort the google translate results

lblAutoTranslateWhenClickingALink.message: Automatically translate when clicking on a link that takes you to the same domain as the current site

lblTranslateSelectedWhenPressTwice.message: Translate selected text when pressing $SHORTCUT_KEY$ twice

lblTranslateTextOverMouseWhenPressTwice.message: Translate the text over the mouse cursor when pressing $SHORTCUT_KEY$ twice

translateClickingOnce.message: Translate the page by clicking once on the button in the address bar. (To see the popup, right-click)

msgToTranslateThisDocument.message: To translate this document $DOC_TYPE$ it is necessary to convert it to HTML

msgSelectServiceConversion.message: Select a service to do this conversion

msgFileLargerThan.message: This service does not support files larger than $FILE_SIZE$
